oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ROTC group photo
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This ROTC group photo was taken by the Military Science Department after it named the company sponsors and officers for the 1966-67 school year

From left to right: Sponsor Elaine Lehr, South Pittsburg, Tennessee; Cadet Lt. Colonel Bob Hardison, Columbia; Cadet Major Robert Huskey, Executive Officer, Tullahoma; Cadet Captain Wayne Willis, Operations Officer, Beersheba Springs. Back row: Cadet 2nd Lt. Steve Tingle, Chattanooga; Cadet 2nd Lt. Ray Lamberth, Intelligence Officer, Goodletsville; Cadet 2nd. Lt. Joe Roberson, Columbia; and Cadet Sergeant First Class Michael Knight; Operations Sergeant, Miami, Florida.

Middle Tennessee State University November 23, 1966
-Murfreesboro-
The Military Science Department at Middle Tennessee State University has named company sponsors and officers for the 1966-'67 school year. Those named for the Brigade Sponsor and Staff are from left to right: Sponsor Elaine Lehr, South Pittsburg, Tennessee; Cadet Lt. Colonel Bob Hardison, Columbia; Cadet Major Robert Huskey, Executive Officer, Tullahoma; Cadet Captain Wayne Willis, Operations Officer, Beersheba Springs; Back row from left to right: Cadet 2nd Lt. Steve Tingle, Chattanooga; Cadet 2nd Lt. Ray Lamberth, Intelligence Officer, Goodletsville; Cadet 2nd. Lt. Joe Roberson, Columbia; and Cadet Sergeant First Class Michael Knight; Operations Sergeant, Miami, Florida.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: United States. Army. Reserve Officers' Training Corps; Military education; Middle Tennessee State University
Military parades & ceremonies; Military training; Group portraits
